definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: double, double over (late) (NH id.; Aram. [[כְּפַל]]; Targum. [[כִּיפְלָא]], [[כּוּפְלָה]], Nab. [[כפל]] Eut:Nab. No. 20, 7 the double; Christ. Pal. Aram. kpl Schwally:Idiot. 46; NSyr. id.; Ar. kiflun the double, kafalun posteriors, buttocks; Eth. kafala: is divide, kfl: a part)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[וְכָפַלְתָּ֫]] Ex 26:9 and thou shalt double over the sixth curtain, i.e. prob. use it double (Di); Pt. pass. [[כָּפוּל]] folded double, of the breastpiece ([[חשֶׁן]]) Ex 28:16, Ex 39:9, Ex 39:9.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[וְתִכָּפֵל]] Ez Eze 21:19 and let the sword be doubled, but very dub.; Co rds. plausibly [[תְּשַׁכֵּל]] let the sword bereave (cf. VB).
